macros.sourceContext: | create object stores and indexes. | This mode is for updating the version number of transactions > | that were started using {{domxref("IDBDatabase.setVersion()")}}. ^ | Transactions of this mode cannot run concurrently with other transactions. | Transactions in this mode are known as upgrade transactions.

title: IDBTransaction: mode property
summary:
The mode read-only property of the
  IDBTransaction interface returns the current mode for accessing the
  data in the object stores in the scope of the transaction (i.e. is the mode to be
  read-only, or do you want to write to the object stores?) The default value is
  readonly.
pageTitle: IDBTransaction: mode property - Web APIs | MDN
